comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This pic appeared in a harvest feature article which was published in the Sydney Mail, 30/1/1907 (p. 285)...where it was titled 'Holiday-Makers in the Harvest Field' (this is the closest link I can find to the page!) - news.google.com/newspapers?id=bGpVAAAAIBAJ&sjid=eJUDA... ; some of the other pics which appeared in this article were evidently taken at 'Combella', near Wellington...so maybe this one was taken there as well...but other pics were evidently taken near Orange and Narromine...and as I've discovered, the Sydney Mail tended to pad out their feature articles with photos from their photo archive...so pending further info emerging, I wouldn't be too emphatic re the location/date. Also see - www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2363537902/
